bill.title: Uniform Commercial Code; Secured Transactions
bill.description: Implements the amendments to Article 9 of the Uniform Commercial Code, relating to secured transactions, set forth by the Uniform Law Commission. Effective July 1, 2013. (HB2162 HD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to CPC/JUD, FIN, referral sheet 6
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC/JUD on Wednesday, 02-01-12 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Herkes, Yamane, Cabanilla, Keith-Agaran, Luke, McKelvey, Tsuji, Ching, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 5 Excused: Representative(s) Brower, Carroll, Coffman, Ito, Souki.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Cabanilla, Herkes, Luke, McKelvey, Tsuji, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 6 Excused: Representative(s) Brower, Carroll, Coffman, Ito, Souki, Fontaine.
(H) Reported from CPC/JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 627-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Herkes, Kawakami, M. Lee, Mizuno, Morikawa excused (5).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 02-23-12 2:00PM in House conference room 308.
(H) Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 17 Ayes: Oshiro, M. Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 847-12), recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 139).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to CPN, JDL.
(S) The committee(s) on CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 03-16-12 9:00AM in conference room 229.

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in CPN were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Galuteria, Nishihara, Solomon, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Taniguchi, Green.
(S) Reported from CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2853) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to JDL.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to JDL.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL will hold a public decision making on 03-27-12 10:30AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in JDL were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, Ihara, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
(S) Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3149) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
(S) One Day Notice 04-04-12.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 468).
(H) Transmitted to Governor.
